entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`entry_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `amount` REAL NOT NULL, `entry_type` TEXT NOT NULL, `transaction_type` TEXT NOT NULL, `transaction_date` INTEGER NOT NULL, `fk_party_id` INTEGER, `fk_category_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `fk_bank_id` INTEGER, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`fk_party_id`) REFERENCES `parties`(`party_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE SET NULL , FOREIGN KEY(`fk_category_id`) REFERENCES `categories`(`category_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE RESTRICT , FOREIGN KEY(`fk_bank_id`) REFERENCES `banks`(`bank_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE SET NULL )

indices.name: index_account_entries_fk_party_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_account_entries_fk_party_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`fk_party_id`)

indices.name: index_account_entries_fk_category_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_account_entries_fk_category_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`fk_category_id`)

indices.name: index_account_entries_fk_bank_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_account_entries_fk_bank_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`fk_bank_id`)

indices.name: index_account_entries_transaction_date
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_account_entries_transaction_date` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`transaction_date`)

indices.name: index_account_entries_entry_type
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_account_entries_entry_type` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`entry_type`)

indices.name: index_account_entries_transaction_type
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_account_entries_transaction_type` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`transaction_type`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`category_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_categories_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_categories_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name` TEXT NOT NULL, `party_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `contact_number` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `address` TEXT, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`attachment_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `fk_entry_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `file_path` TEXT NOT NULL, `file_name` TEXT, `mime_type` TEXT, `uploaded_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`fk_entry_id`) REFERENCES `account_entries`(`entry_id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_attachments_fk_entry_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_attachments_fk_entry_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`fk_entry_id`)

entities.createSql: CREATE VIRTUAL TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` USING FTS4(`title` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, content=`account_entries`)
contentSyncTriggers: CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_account_entries_fts_BEFORE_UPDATE BEFORE UPDATE ON `account_entries` BEGIN DELETE FROM `account_entries_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END
CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_account_entries_fts_BEFORE_DELETE BEFORE DELETE ON `account_entries` BEGIN DELETE FROM `account_entries_fts` WHERE `docid`=OLD.`rowid`; END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_account_entries_fts_AFTER_UPDATE AFTER UPDATE ON `account_entries` BEGIN INSERT INTO `account_entries_fts`(`docid`, `title`, `description`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`title`, NEW.`description`); END

CREATE TRIGGER IF NOT EXISTS room_fts_content_sync_account_entries_fts_AFTER_INSERT AFTER INSERT ON `account_entries` BEGIN INSERT INTO `account_entries_fts`(`docid`, `title`, `description`) VALUES (NEW.`rowid`, NEW.`title`, NEW.`description`); END

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`bank_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `description` TEXT, `created_at` INTEGER NOT NULL, `updated_at` INTEGER NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_banks_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_banks_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
